A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed it and really don’t get the fan complaints. Particularly\, in TFW some people complained that “oh\, it’s too much like the originals.” And now TLJ took some big risks (which I think paid off) and some of you are like “oh nooo\, this isn’t the Star Wars I’m familiar with.” You can’t satisfy everyone\, that’s for sure. I think people need to experience the movie itself in order to form their own opinion. It’s a worthy installment in this trilogy (although the Force Awakens is definitely a little bit stronger plot-wise)\, BUT I still loved every moment of watching it. ****QUICK SPOILERS**** I do wish that we got to see more of Captain Phasma as I’m a big fan of Gwendoline Christie (especially in Game of Thrones\, go Brienne of Tarth wooo). Maybe she lived? I can only hope lol In addition\, I just wanted to say that I love Rose (she’s adorable) and the “Force Skype” scenes with Kylo and Rey were great. I look forward to seeing more of their connection in the next movie. ALSO\, I was dying at how dramatic and sassy Luke was. Also Yoda. Enough said.
